alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Cherry; Keya Paha; Rock; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 4:27AM CDT until July 29 at 5:15AM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Cherry County in north central Nebraska... Northern Rock County in north central Nebraska... Brown County in north central Nebraska... Northwestern Blaine County in north central Nebraska... Northeastern Thomas County in north central Nebraska... Southwestern Keya Paha County in north central Nebraska... * Until 515 AM CDT. * At 427 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Johnstown to 7 miles south of Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Valentine, Ainsworth, Bassett, Long Pine, Newport, Johnstown, Purdum, Brownlee, Merritt Reservoir, Norden, Valentine National Wildlife Refuge, Elsmere, Wood Lake, Hofeld Lake, Raven, Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area, Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area, Anderson Bridge State Wildlife Management Area, Smith Falls State Park and Koshopah. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 169 and 210. Highway 20 between mile markers 192 and 272. Highway 97 between mile markers 101 and 141. Highway 83 between mile markers 156 and 216. Highway 12 between mile markers 1 and 35, between mile markers 38 and 39, and between mile markers 41 and 46. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Cherry; Keya Paha; Rock; Thomas
